LocationPicker.title: Nzvimbo yezita
LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: Isu tinofanirwa kuwana yako ruzivo ruzivo kuti tipe masevhisi ari nani, inotenderwa here?

LocationPicker.locationUnavailable: Nzvimbo yazvino haigone kuwanikwa, ndapota tarisa iyo mudziyo nzvimbo yebasa
